text: School of the Americas Assassins is a 1994 American short documentary film about human rights abuses by graduates of School of the Americas. Produced by Robert Richter, it was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *School of Assassins at Richter Videos * Category:1994 films Category:1994 short films Category:1994 documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about human rights
title: School of the Americas Assassins
